scripts.preinstall: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd libauth && yarn && yarn build
scripts.test:lint: yarn test:prettier && yarn test:eslint && yarn test:spelling
scripts.e2e:report:keep: [ ! -f playwright-report-keep ] || mv playwright-report-keep playwright-report-keep-$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%MZ) && mv playwright-report playwright-report-keep && yarn e2e:report:keep:view
scripts.e2e:docker: node -e "fetch('http://localhost:3000').then(res => res.status === 200 ? console.log('Running e2e tests in Docker using base URL: http://localhost:3000') : Promise.reject()).catch(() => { console.error(`No server is listening at: http://localhost:3000. Run 'yarn start' or 'yarn preview' in another tab and try again.`); process.exit(1); } );" && yarn e2e:docker:bash -c 'DOCKER=1 yarn test:e2e'
scripts.e2e:docker:prod: node -e "fetch('http://localhost:31313').then(res => res.status === 200 ? console.log('Running e2e tests in Docker using base URL: http://localhost:31313') : Promise.reject()).catch(() => {console.error(`No server is listening at: http://localhost:31313. Run 'yarn preview:prod' in another tab and try again.`); process.exit(1); });" && yarn e2e:docker:bash -c 'DOCKER=1 yarn test:e2e:prod'
scripts.cov: rm -rf .nyc_output && yarn test:e2e; yarn cov:html && open coverage/index.html
scripts.cov:both: rm -rf .nyc_output && yarn test:e2e && yarn test:e2e:prod; yarn cov:html && open coverage/index.html
